name: Caravel
cleanBio: Caravel, a soul determined to break down barriers, is blazing her own trail in the world of electronic music. Boldly fusing the raw rhythms of industrial techno with complex melodies, she draws listeners into a thrilling world of textures, drama and intense emotion. Her hard-hitting productions have found their way onto renowned labels such as Exhale and Sacred Court, leaving a trail of violence and intensity in their wake. In addition to her talents as a producer and DJ, Caravel orchestrates Resilience parties around the world, creating unique experiences where the music merges with the spray of seething passions.
